name: Wali Timer
description: Wali Timer! A Perfect to for Scrabblers consisting of a Timer, A Word Checker and A Word Search.   Features:  Timer: Counts down from 25 Mins or any desired time Option to set different time for 2 Players Pause/Play Challenge option   Word Checker: Search Multiple Words Supports both NWL18 and CSW19  Word Search: Supports both NWL18 and CSW19 Available search options are: Anagram Search Starts with Ends With Definition 2 Letters 3 Letters Q without U No Vowels Bingo Stem 6+1 Bingo Stem 7+1
